section.section: The fee for a license is $10.

The clerk shall:
retain $5 of the fee; and
pay $5 of the fee into the general fund of the county.
A party to be married may obtain a replacement for a valid marriage license while the license is valid.
The fee for a replacement license is $10, payable into the General Fund of the State.

text.section:
Except as otherwise provided in this section:
any county or group of 2 or more counties may set an additional fee of up to $25 for each license; and
the proceeds shall be used to fund domestic violence programs.

In Anne Arundel County:
the County Council may set by ordinance an additional fee of up to $45 for each license;
the clerk shall pay the proceeds from the additional fee to the general fund of the county each month; and
the County Council shall distribute the proceeds to promote or fund domestic violence programs.

In Baltimore City:
the Mayor and City Council shall set by resolution an additional fee of up to $75 for each license;
the clerk shall pay the proceeds from the additional fee to the Mayor and City Council each month; and
the proceeds shall be used to fund domestic violence programs that have 24-hour intake ability.

In Calvert County:
the Board of County Commissioners may set an additional fee of up to $55 for each license;
the clerk shall pay the proceeds from the additional fee to the County Commissioners each month; and
the proceeds shall be used to fund battered spouse shelters and domestic violence programs in Calvert County.

In Charles County:
the Board of County Commissioners may set an additional fee of up to $35 for each license;
the clerk shall pay the proceeds from the additional fee to the County Commissioners each month; and
the proceeds shall be used to fund domestic violence programs located in Charles County.

In Frederick County:
the Board of County Commissioners may set an additional fee, in an amount not to exceed $65, for each license;
the clerk shall pay the proceeds from the additional fee to the County Commissioners each month; and
the proceeds, in addition to designated federal, State, and county funds, shall be used to fund domestic violence programs established under Title 4, Subtitle 5 of this article.

In Garrett County:
the Board of County Commissioners may set an additional fee of up to $40 for each license;
the clerk shall pay the proceeds from the additional fee to the County Commissioners each month; and
the proceeds shall be used to fund domestic violence programs in Garrett County.

In Washington County:
the Board of County Commissioners may set an additional fee of up to $50 for each license;
the clerk shall pay the proceeds from the additional fee to the County Commissioners each month; and
the proceeds shall be used to fund battered spouse shelters and domestic violence programs in Washington County.
